entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
